headline: Technical reading from the Cloudflare blog for the holidays
keywords: Year in Review, Product News, LavaRand, DDoS, Geo Key Manager, DNS, LUA, Privacy Pass, Vulnerabilities, Bots
description: During 2017 Cloudflare published 172 blog posts (including this one). If you need a distraction from the holiday festivities at this time of year here are some highlights from the year.
